text: Umwe aiva neruzivo rweGwaro akati: “Ndinouya nacho kwamuri musati mabhwaira meso enyu!” Saka (Sulaimaan (Soromoni)) paakaona chava mberi kwake, akati: “Izvi kuda kwenyasha dzaTenzi vangu, kuti vaone kuti ndinotenda (zvakanaka) kana kuti handitendi! Uye uyo anotenda, zvirokwazvo, kutenda kwake kwakamunakira iye pachezvake; uye uyo asingatendi (kusatenda kwake kurasikirwa iye pachezvake). Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vangu vakapfuma, uye vanopa zvizhinji.”
